meanings: (소리를) yell (out/at), shout (at), holler (at), shriek (at), call out, bawl (out), thunder, (비명을) scream (out), howl, screech

vlive.korean: [첫 번째 댓글 소진] '끝나고 시원하게 소리질렀다, 인정?' [The first comment: Sojin] "After it was over, I screamed refreshingly. Do you admit it?" 듣기 View video GOT YA! 공원소녀 : [GOT YA! 공원소녀] Episode 6 short clip :: 누구의 댓글인가?! 댓글 구별사 서령이 나타났다!
vlive.english: [The first comment: Sojin] "After it was over, I screamed refreshingly. Do you admit it?"

vlive.korean: 소리를 질렀다. I also screamed. 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 깜짝 V~
수영장에서 이제 나는 거기서 소리질렀다. I shouted at the pool. 듣기 View video YG Family : MOBB
팬들이 너희 보고 좋아서 소리 질렀다, 이거지? "The fans screamed because they liked you, huh?" 듣기 View video Park Hae Jin : [Park Hae-Jin] True story - No. 45
vlive.english: "The fans screamed because they liked you, huh?"

vlive.korean: 소리 질러! Make some noise! 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!

examples.korean: She bawled at him in front of everyone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 모든 사람들이 보는 앞에서 그에게 소리를 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She bawled at him in front of everyone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The car was doused in petrol and set alight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (누군가가) 그 승용차에 휘발유를 잔뜩 부어 불을 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car was doused in petrol and set alight. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Let go of me!’ he squeaked nervously. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “ (날) 놓으란 말야!” 그가 신경질적으로 꽥 소리를 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Let go of me!’ he squeaked nervously. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The children squealed with delight when they saw the puppy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 강아지를 보자 아이들이 기뻐서 소리를 깩깩 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The children squealed with delight when they saw the puppy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She yelled out in pain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아파서 소리를 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She yelled out in pain. Add to Wordbook
